welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Epping, a charming town known for its picturesque countryside and quaint shops. Get ready to explore and immerse yourself in its beauty. We hope you enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stansted Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Stansted Airport is primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and charter flights, offering exclusive services and amenities.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wethersfield Airport handles all commercial flights and has a variety of amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Wethersfield Airport caters to the needs of private jet travelers and offers exclusive services and facilities.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free by selecting the network and entering a password provided by the airport staff.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southend Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Southend Airport serves as an overflow for the main terminal during peak travel times.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly European and some long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving a mix of long-haul and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly British Airways and Iberia flights.

wifi.note: Free for 45 minutes, then a fee is required for longer use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rochester Airport is used for the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
